scripts.routegen: yarn workspace route-manager route-codegen && concurrently -n client,client-seo,server "yarn workspace client prettier --write  'src/routes/**/*.{ts,tsx}'"  "yarn workspace client-seo prettier --write  'src/routes/**/*.{ts,tsx}'" "yarn workspace server prettier --write  'src/routes/**/*.{ts,tsx}'"   -p "[{name} - {time}]" -c "yellow","blue","red"
scripts.format: concurrently -n common,client,client-seo,server "yarn workspace common format" "yarn workspace client format" "yarn workspace client-seo format" "yarn workspace server format" -p "[{name} - {time}]" -c "green","yellow","blue","red"
